thread.title: Wiz Khalifa cited for public urination in Pittsburgh
thread.title_full: Wiz Khalifa cited for public urination in Pittsburgh

title: Wiz Khalifa cited for public urination in Pittsburgh
text:
Wiz Khalifa onstage in Las Vegas. (Photo: Ethan Miller, Getty Images)
41 CONNECT 32 TWEET LINKEDIN 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Rapper Wiz Khalifa was cited for urinating in public after a hometown show in Pittsburgh early Saturday morning.
Pittsburgh city public safety spokeswoman Sonya Toler told the AP the incident happened at about 2:30 a.m. Saturday behind a popular Pittsburgh bar called The Flats.
The rapper, a Pittsburgh native who celebrated his PGH pride in his 2010 breakout hit Black and Yellow , was in town performing at the University of Pittsburgh's Midnight Madness basketball season kickoff Friday night.
ENTERTAIN THIS!
Wiz Khalifa remembers Paul Walker in 'See You Again' video
His citation comes after a record-breaking week for the rapper; the music video for See You Again , his summer hit with Charlie Puth featured in Furious 7 , just became the first rap video to get 1 billion views on YouTube.
"I heard how cool and genuine he was," Khalifa told USA TODAY about Paul Walker, the late actor who's remembered in See You Again . "Everybody who knew him just calls him their brother and talks about how much they loved him, and how warm and welcoming he was."
